title: How to stream YouTube videos effectively - Quora

response.answer_text: If you’ve watched the video before you’re gonna have to go into your history and clear your cookies.Watch the whole video.Clear your cookies.Watch at least 2 videos before you watch the one you want to streamWatch the video you want to stream and repeat the whole process

To stream your any gaming or casual video on YouTube effectively, there are some tips I will give you. First of all, if you are livestreaming a game(like PUBG), use a good screen recorder. Use OBS for PC and DU for phone. You can also use camera feature for showing your face. Use Nightbot, which is helpful for you livestreams. Nightbot helps to communicate with the viewers when you can’t answer them. Use donation messege by which you can communicate with the ones who have given you donation or Super Chat. And most importantly, use Paytm on screen feature. If you seemed my answer useful, please upvote it. If you like my content, please folllow me. Thanks.
